**Purpose:** This document outlines the specific code style and quality rules for the Karmada project. When reviewing code or generating PR descriptions, Copilot should enforce these rules to ensure consistency and maintainability.

## Code Review

> **Note:** These rules supplement the official Go style guide. Where this guide is silent, standard Go best practices apply.

Please follow the coding guidelines defined in `CODE_STYLE_GUIDE.md` file located in the root of this repository.
